Meet Cheneeta!

Course
Certificate IV in Design
Currently Working
As head designer at The Quick Flick
LOVED my experience studying with TGDS and would 100% recommend the institute to anybody considering it. The tutors are the loveliest most supportive team you could ask for and are always on hand whenever you need assistance or support. The school equipped me with the skills I needed to enter the industry once I completed the course.
